body_html: This PR has been waiting for response for two weeks, and based on @mrry's review it sounds like it won't fix the issue it's trying to address. So I'm going to close this for now. @DjangoPeng thanks for sending it in, and feel free to open a new PR that addresses mrry's concerns.

body: This PR has been waiting for response for two weeks, and based on @mrry's review it sounds like it won't fix the issue it's trying to address. So I'm going to close this for now. @DjangoPeng thanks for sending it in, and feel free to open a new PR that addresses mrry's concerns.
